translations.chinese: 漢王還至定陶，馳入齊王信壁，奪其軍。
translations.english: King Han returned to Dingtao and galloped into King Qi Xin's encampment, seizing his army.

translations.chinese: 初項羽所立臨江王共敖前死，子尉嗣 立為王，不降。
translations.english: Initially, the Linjiang King Gong Ao whom Xiang Yu had established had died earlier. His son Wei succeeded as king and did not surrender.
He sent Lu Wan and Liu Jia to attack and capture Wei.

translations.chinese: 春正月，追尊兄伯號曰武哀侯。
translations.english: In the first month of spring, he posthumously honored his elder brother with the title Lord Wu'ai.

translations.chinese: 下令曰：「楚地已定，義帝亡後，欲存恤楚眾，以定其主。
translations.english: He issued an order: "Chu territory is already pacified. After the Righteous Emperor's death, I wish to care for the Chu multitudes and establish their ruler.
